actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution honoring the life of Washington Post columnist and Atlantic Monthly editor Michael Kelly, and expressing the deepest condolences of the Senate to his family on his death.

summary.text: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on April 11, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Honors the outstanding career and memorable writings of Michael Kelly (Washington Post columnist and Atlantic Monthly editor who died while embedded with the Third Infantry Division of the U.S. Army in Iraq). Expresses condolences to his family.

titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of Washington Post columnist and Atlantic Monthly editor Michael Kelly, and expressing the deepest condolences of the Senate to his family on his death.
